(a) After which radiologist do diminishing marginal returns begin for Raydisha’s Radiology Clinic? Explain using numbers.

(b) Assume Raydisha’s Radiology Clinic sells its radiological services in a perfectly competitive market at a unit price of $10. Calculate the marginal revenue product of the seventh radiologist. Show your work.

(c) Raydisha’s Radiology Clinic hires radiologists in a perfectly competitive labor market for radiologists at a wage rate of $120 per hour, and the market price of radiological services remains $10. How many radiologists will Raydisha’s Radiology Clinic hire to maximize its profit? Explain using marginal analysis.

(d) Assume there is a decrease in the demand for radiological services in the market and Raydisha’s Radiology Clinic continues to operate. What will happen to each of the following?(i) The market wage rate. Explain.(ii) The marginal revenue product curve for Raydisha’s Radiology Clinic. Explain.
